segments.text: School has added several new courses to our grade this semester . I have more homework to do now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought you would like PE .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I do like PE , but I am interested in science .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you interested in science ? I can't believe it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Through this course , I can learn more about the world around us clearly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your parents would be happy if they knew that . Because you are always a naughty boy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Naughty ? I'm naughty ? I'm just clever . So I only do the things I am interested in .
segments.speaker: S1
